title: Vietnamese Locale for LoL Client?
body: I was wondering if Riot has a locale to make my client appear in Vietnamese, I can do it in Korean ( tested to see if I can change the language ) but from searching around there is no Vietnamese locale for me to put in? Will there be one in the future or none at all?

replies.body: Language can be changed through the patcher on the top right; however, languages are limited and specific to each region.  For example, NA only supports English currently.  You can check our[ language support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751594-Changing-Game-Language) guide for more details.  Hope that helps!
